"Using e=3 as encryption exponent"

p:

q:

"First modulus"

n := p·q

p2:

q2:

"Second modulus"

n2 := p2·q2

p3:

q3:

"Third modulus"

n3 := p3·q3

"The plaintext"

m:

"The three ciphertext messages"

          3    
c := MOD(m , n)

           3     
c2 := MOD(m , n2)

           3     
c3 := MOD(m , n3)

"Calculate values for CRT"

modulus := n·n2·n3

mod1 := n2·n3

mod2 := n·n3

mod3 := n·n2

                   (p - 1)·(q - 1) - 1    
mod1inv := MOD(mod1                   , n)

                   (p2 - 1)·(q2 - 1) - 1     
mod2inv := MOD(mod2                     , n2)

                   (p3 - 1)·(q3 - 1) - 1     
mod3inv := MOD(mod3                     , n3)

"Calculate x, which is just m^3"

x:=MOD(c·mod1·mod1inv+c2·mod2·mod2inv+c3·mod3·mod3inv,modulus)

"Recover the plaintext by taking cube root of x"

              1/3
mregained := x   

"Houston, we have a problem"
